title.narrative: Environmental Rehabilitation Belo Horizonte
N/A
N/A
Rehabilitación Ambiental de Belo Horizonte

description.narrative: Support improved quality of life of the population of the municipality of Belo Horizonte, through improving their environmental conditions. For this the program will emphasize its efforts on: (i) infrastructure works aimed at cleaning up waterways and reducing flood risks, (ii) environmental and health education to promote awareness of the population, (iii ) institutional strengthening to ensure the effectiveness of the program.

participating-org.narrative: Secretaria Municipal da Coordenação de Política Urbana e Ambiental
